channel.title: Github on My website

item.title: Create a Personal Website With Hugo
item.description: Introduction I thought to build a personal website several times, but failed to do it. At one weekend of December, 2022 I decided to complete this website project before the new year 2023. I started by searching “create a personal website” in youtube. The algorithm recommends videos with Hugo. My first thought ðŸ¤”: since when Hugo Boss started to build websites instead of selling expensive clothes ðŸ˜„. Some videos promise to do it with Hugo within 10 minutes.
